# Vendor overrides

Place optional local copies of frontend assets here to avoid CDN usage:

- `htmx.min.js`
- `marked.min.js`
- `purify.min.js` (DOMPurify)
- `highlight.min.js`
- `hljs-github.min.css` (Highlight.js GitHub theme)

When present, the app will load these first; CDN links remain as fallback.
